properties.name: spring.minio.bucket
properties.description: Bucket name for the application. The bucket must already exists on Minio.

properties.name: spring.minio.check-bucket
properties.description: Check if the bucket exists on Minio instance. Settings this false will disable the check during the application context initialization. This property should be used for debug purpose only, because operations on Minio will not work during runtime.

properties.name: spring.minio.connect-timeout
properties.description: Define the connect timeout for the Minio Client.

properties.name: spring.minio.create-bucket
properties.description: Will create the bucket if it do not exists on the Minio instance.

properties.name: spring.minio.metric-name
properties.description: Metric configuration prefix which are registered on Actuator.

properties.name: spring.minio.read-timeout
properties.description: Define the read timeout for the Minio Client.

properties.name: spring.minio.secure
properties.description: If the scheme is not provided in {@code url} property, define if the connection is done via HTTP or HTTPS.

properties.name: spring.minio.url
properties.description: URL for Minio instance. Can include the HTTP scheme. Must include the port. If the port is not provided, then the port of the HTTP is taken.

properties.name: spring.minio.write-timeout
properties.description: Define the write timeout for the Minio Client.
